title: Cheers!
sinopse:
Kenta wants to join his new employer's cheering squad, but he finds it's been dissolved. What he finds instead is a cheerLEADING squad which only accepts female members. After showing a lot of perseverance, he is finally accepted as the manager. You can probably guess what follows: large group of sexy cheer-girls, one male protagonist...

(Source: MU)
